Title: Makes provisions relating to the collateral estoppel effect of issues decided by certain arbitrators
Summary: Provides that with respect to a serious personal injury action still permissible under the no-fault insurance system, the award or decision of an arbitrator or master arbitrator rendered in a no-fault arbitration will not constitute a collateral estoppel of the issues arbitrated.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the collateral estoppel effect of issues decided by certain arbitrators
